page.title: 11SHOPPING IN CLOPHILL
page.content:
We are fortunate to have two very good{shops}in the village. One is the {Sub-Post Office and General Store where people collect their pensions & family allowances, stamps & licences. The other is a{Butcher}who attracts people from miles around by the quality of his meat. Many villagers shop in the nearby towns and we took a survey of peoples' {shopping habits.}Out of 100 question sheets we had 66 replies.
{56 %} mostly shop for{food}in{Flitwick {17 % Bedford {11 % Luton {11 % Kempston { 4\% Shefford { 3 % Clophill { 1\% Hitchin
